description.pins: An array with arrays for each location. Can contain lat, lng, a tooltip and an icon.
description.startPosition: Sets the start location of the map. Can contain lat, lng and a zoom value between 5-20
description.mapStyle: Style of the map (pale, dark, color, default)
description.title: The title
description.columns: Number of columns in the sidebar
description.height: Needs to have a css height value
